raw: * Returns the root widget whose children will have scroll on drag session
* behavior. Widget was set on constructor or will be application root by
* default.

* scroll on drag session

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the root widget whose children will have scroll on drag session behavior. Widget was set on constructor or will be application root by default.

{qx.ui.core.Widget} The root widget whose children will have
 scroll on drag session

raw: * Finds the first scrollable parent (in the parent chain).

@param.body: widget {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The widget to start from.

raw: * Whether the widget is scrollable.

raw: * Gets the bounds of the given scrollable.
* @param scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
* @return {Map} A map with all four bounds (e.g. {"left":0, "top":20, "right":0, "bottom":80}).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the bounds of the given scrollable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map with all four bounds (e.g. {"left":0, "top":20, "right":0, "bottom":80}).

raw: * Gets the edge type or null if the pointer isn't within one of the thresholds.
* @param diff {Map} Difference map with all for edgeTypes.
* @param thresholdX {Number} x-axis threshold.
* @param thresholdY {Number} y-axis threshold.
* @return {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the edge type or null if the pointer isn't within one of the thresholds.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: diff {Map} Difference map with all for edgeTypes.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: thresholdX {Number} x-axis threshold.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: thresholdY {Number} y-axis threshold.

raw: * Gets the axis ('x' or 'y') by the edge type.
* @param edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').
* @throws {Error} If edgeType is not one of the distinct four ones.
* @return {String} Returns 'y' or 'x'.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the axis ('x' or 'y') by the edge type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} If edgeType is not one of the distinct four ones.

raw: * Gets the threshold amount by edge type.
* @param edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').
* @return {Number} The threshold of the x or y axis.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the threshold amount by edge type.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: edgeType {String} One of the four edgeTypes ('left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom').

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Number} The threshold of the x or y axis.

raw: * Whether the scrollbar is visible.
* @param scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
* @param axis {String} Can be 'y' or 'x'.
* @return {Boolean} Whether the scrollbar is visible.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: axis {String} Can be 'y' or 'x'.

raw: * Whether the scrollbar is exceeding it's maximum position.
* @param scrollbar {qx.ui.core.scroll.IScrollBar} Scrollbar to check.
* @param axis {String} Can be 'y' or 'x'.
* @param amount {Number} Amount to scroll which may be negative.
* @return {Boolean} Whether the amount will exceed the scrollbar max position.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the scrollbar is exceeding it's maximum position.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollbar {qx.ui.core.scroll.IScrollBar} Scrollbar to check.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: axis {String} Can be 'y' or 'x'.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: amount {Number} Amount to scroll which may be negative.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the amount will exceed the scrollbar max position.

raw: * Calculates the threshold exceedance (which may be negative).
* @param diff {Number} Difference value of one edgeType.
* @param threshold {Number} x-axis or y-axis threshold.
* @return {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the threshold exceedance (which may be negative).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: diff {Number} Difference value of one edgeType.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: threshold {Number} x-axis or y-axis threshold.

raw: * Calculates the scroll amount (which may be negative).
* The amount is influenced by the scrollbar size (bigger = faster)
* the exceedanceAmount (bigger = faster) and the slowDownFactor.
* @param scrollbarSize {Number} Size of the scrollbar.
* @param exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).
* @return {Number} Scroll amount (positive or negative).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the scroll amount (which may be negative). The amount is influenced by the scrollbar size (bigger = faster) the exceedanceAmount (bigger = faster) and the slowDownFactor.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollbarSize {Number} Size of the scrollbar.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

raw: * Scrolls the given scrollable on the given axis for the given amount.
* @param scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.
* @param axis {String} Can be 'y' or 'x'.
* @param exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls the given scrollable on the given axis for the given amount.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scrollable {qx.ui.core.Widget} Scrollable which has scrollbar child controls.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: axis {String} Can be 'y' or 'x'.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: exceedanceAmount {Number} Threshold exceedance amount (positive or negative).
